#summary Tools for the CCTM
#labels Help

Tools offer additional functionality for the CCTM plugin.  

= Available Tools =

== Import ==

This allows you [Import] a CCTM definition file.  The definition files can be created by any other site running 0.9.4 or later of the CCTM.  The files are in the JSON format and use a `.cctm.json` extension.

== Export ==

Use the export tool to [Export] a CCTM definition file.  You can either save to your local library or download a copy of the definition file.

-----------------
= More to Come =

There will be more tools in future versions of the CCTM... stay tuned.
